report.title: Testing Out Some Kitchen Chemistry
report.author: Desperate Psychenaut
report.bodytext: I attempted to prepare methcathinone acetate (I couldn't obtain any hydrochloric acid) from 720mg of pseudoephedrine using the chilled permanganate method. /n /n My friend L. and I divided the powder into roughly ten lines. We each snorted a line, and realized that too much acetic acid had been added. We dissolved another line each into water and consumed that. /n /n We did some laundry and temporarily parted ways to do some cleaning. Whenever I sat down, my leg would bounce. L. reported that she could not sit still. /n /n I got some cramps and felt the need to defecate (but only managed to emit a bit of water). /n /n After about two hours of laundry and cleaning/organizing, we decided to dose again. L. tried to snort another line, but the burning was too intense, so she consumed the remainder of the line orally. I consumed one more line orally. /n /n After dosing, we set out on a long walk. Everything seemed sharp to the both of us. My senses felt fine-tuned. I wasn't over-talkative nor irritated, but I was pretty happy in general. /n /n The stronger effects seemed to last around two hours. For me, the speediness came in waves. I was never sure if I was plateauing or coming down. I had done DXM the previous night and the cat cleared up any last 'fuzziness' feeling remaining in my head from the DXM. I felt a bit physically worn out (I tend to get the tired-but-still-wide-awake effect on uppers). /n /n L. had no appetite, and couldn't get to sleep for around seven hours. I managed to sleep after a few hours, but the sleep was somewhat interrupted. /n /n (After the walk, I think we consumed a line more apiece in water solution, but my memory is fuzzy... I have about two lines left, so this seems right.)
